# UK Regulatory Approval Flowchart by Scale

*Generated by Claude | 10 January 2026*

---


## Simpler summary
  Mandatory (to charge customers):
  - Ofgem Supply Licence: 9-18 months ← the real wait
  - Industry codes run in parallel, so don't add time

  Optional (for grid trading revenue):
  - VLP: 3-6 months, also runs in parallel

  Per-install:
  - G98 (≤3.68kW): notification only, no wait
  - G99 (>3.68kW): 4-6 month approval each

  So the simplified version is:

  Month:  0         9-18
          │          │
          ▼          ▼
       START ──────► SUPPLY LICENCE GRANTED ──► OPERATIONAL
          │                │
          └── VLP, codes ──┘
              (parallel)

  The 12-18 month wait is the whole story for regulatory. Everything else slots in during that wait or is trivial (G98).

  The only decision that matters:
  - Want grid flexibility revenue? → Add VLP (runs parallel, no extra wait)
  - Want faster per-site scaling? → Use ≤3.68kW batteries (G98 vs G99)






## Overview

Three distinct regulatory pathways exist depending on battery size and business ambition. **All paths require Ofgem Supply Licence** to charge customers a flat rate (MRP rules).

---

## SCALE 1: Small Batteries (≤3.68kW per home)

**Fastest route to market. Avoids G99 delays.**

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                        SMALL SCALE PATHWAY                              │
│                    (≤3.68kW single-phase batteries)                     │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  MONTH 0-1: START PARALLEL TRACKS                                       │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                         │
│   TRACK A: SUPPLY LICENCE          TRACK B: INDUSTRY CODES              │
│   ─────────────────────────        ────────────────────────             │
│   Engage Ofgem                     SEC accession (£541)                 │
│   Submit application (£350-1,050)  BSC accession (£500)                 │
│                                    DCUSA/REC (~£1,000)                  │
│                                                                         │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼ 9-18 months
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  LICENCE GRANTED                                                        │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  PER INSTALLATION: G98 (Notification only)                              │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  • Cost: ~£50 admin only                                                │
│  • Timeline: Install first, notify DNO within 28 days                   │
│  • No approval wait - can scale immediately                             │
│  • Must comply with PAS 63100:2024 fire safety                          │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
                          ┌─────────────────┐
                          │  OPERATIONAL    │
                          │  12-18 months   │
                          └─────────────────┘
```

**Key advantage:** G98 is notification-only. No DNO approval bottleneck.

---

## SCALE 2: Larger Batteries (>3.68kW per home)

**Higher capacity but significant DNO delays.**

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                       MEDIUM SCALE PATHWAY                              │
│                    (>3.68kW or any export-capable)                      │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  MONTH 0-1: START PARALLEL TRACKS                                       │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                         │
│   TRACK A: SUPPLY LICENCE          TRACK B: INDUSTRY CODES              │
│   (same as Scale 1)                (same as Scale 1)                    │
│                                                                         │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼ 9-18 months
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  LICENCE GRANTED                                                        │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  PER INSTALLATION: G99 Application Required                             │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│  • Cost: £300-750 per property                                          │
│  • Timeline: 4-6 MONTHS per application (official: 8-12 weeks)          │
│  • Requires DNO approval BEFORE installation                            │
│  • May trigger grid reinforcement costs (rare but expensive)            │
│  • G100 additional if export-limited: +£300-700, +2-4 weeks             │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
                          ┌─────────────────┐
                          │  OPERATIONAL    │
                          │  16-24 months   │
                          └─────────────────┘
```

**Key risk:** G99 is the bottleneck. 1,000 installations = 1,000 separate 4-6 month applications.

---

## SCALE 3: Full Grid Trading (VPP Model)

**Unlocks second revenue stream: sell flexibility to National Grid.**

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                        FULL VPP PATHWAY                                 │
│              (Supply + Grid Flexibility Revenue)                        │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  MONTH 0-1: START THREE PARALLEL TRACKS                                 │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                         │
│  TRACK A: SUPPLY     TRACK B: INDUSTRY    TRACK C: VLP                  │
│  LICENCE             CODES                REGISTRATION                  │
│  ────────────────    ─────────────────    ─────────────────             │
│  Engage Ofgem        SEC (£541)           Elexon expression             │
│  Submit (£350-1,050) BSC (£500)           of interest                   │
│                      DCUSA/REC (~£1,000)  BSC accession                 │
│                                                                         │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                    ┌───────────────┴───────────────┐
                    ▼                               ▼
    ┌───────────────────────────┐   ┌───────────────────────────┐
    │  VLP QUALIFICATION        │   │  SUPPLY LICENCE           │
    │  3-6 months               │   │  9-18 months              │
    ├───────────────────────────┤   ├───────────────────────────┤
    │  • Party registration     │   │  • Ofgem assessment       │
    │  • Register Secondary     │   │  • Code accession         │
    │    BMUs                   │   │    completion             │
    │  • CVA/SVA qualification  │   │                           │
    │  • KPMG audit             │   │                           │
    │  • PAB approval           │   │                           │
    │  Cost: £500 + testing     │   │                           │
    │  Ongoing: £125/month      │   │                           │
    └───────────────────────────┘   └───────────────────────────┘
                    │                               │
                    └───────────────┬───────────────┘
                                    ▼
                    ┌───────────────────────────────┐
                    │  BOTH APPROVALS COMPLETE      │
                    └───────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│  DUAL REVENUE MODEL ACTIVE                                              │
├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
│                                                                         │
│   REVENUE 1: Customer Supply          REVENUE 2: Grid Flexibility       │
│   ─────────────────────────           ───────────────────────────       │
│   Flat rate to customers              Balancing Mechanism               │
│   Arbitrage on wholesale price        Demand Flexibility Service        │
│                                       Ancillary services                │
│                                                                         │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
                                    │
                                    ▼
                          ┌─────────────────┐
                          │  OPERATIONAL    │
                          │  12-18 months   │
                          └─────────────────┘
```

---

## Cost Summary by Scale

| Scale | One-off Regulatory Cost | Per-Installation | Time to Market |
|-------|------------------------|------------------|----------------|
| **Small (≤3.68kW)** | £5,000-10,000 | ~£50 (G98) | **12-18 months** |
| **Medium (>3.68kW)** | £5,000-10,000 | £300-750 (G99) | **16-24 months** |
| **Full VPP** | £6,000-12,000 | Same as above | **12-18 months** |

---

## Critical Decision Points

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    STRATEGIC DECISION TREE                              │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

                    Do you need grid trading revenue?
                                    │
                    ┌───────────────┴───────────────┐
                    │ YES                           │ NO
                    ▼                               ▼
            Register as VLP                 Supply licence only
            (+£625 + £125/mo)               (still required)
                    │                               │
                    └───────────────┬───────────────┘
                                    │
                    Can you scale with ≤3.68kW batteries?
                                    │
                    ┌───────────────┴───────────────┐
                    │ YES                           │ NO
                    ▼                               ▼
            Use G98 route                   G99 required
            (notify-only)                   (4-6 month wait
            Scale FAST                      per installation)
```

---

## Regulatory Timeline (Gantt View)

```
Month:  0    3    6    9    12   15   18   21   24
        │    │    │    │    │    │    │    │    │
Supply  ████████████████████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░
Licence [─────Application + Assessment─────]

Industry████████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░
Codes   [───Accession───]

VLP     ░░░░████████████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░
        [Qualification + Audit]

G98     ░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░████████████████████
Install                     [Post-licence: immediate]

G99     ░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░████████████████
Install                         [4-6 mo per site]

█ = Active work
░ = Waiting/parallel activity
```
